Baek Ri-yeon.description: The protagonist and narrator who possesses the body of a minor villain in a martial arts novel. After being killed by Ya-ul, she regresses to her childhood.

夜蔚.description: 小說中的幕後黑手與最終反派，天殺團團長。擁有帶著淚痣的絕世美貌，性格冷酷，在第一世中親手殺死了百里蓮。

百里蓮.description: 故事的主角與旁白，百里義剛的女兒。在前世被視為毫無路用的反派配角，在被夜蔚殺死後，帶著記憶重生回到父親尚在人世的時期。

弔唁者.description: 在百里義剛靈堂中出現，對百里蓮品頭論足並散布流言蜚語的賓客。

百里義剛.description: 百里世家四公子，百里蓮的父親，也是原著男主角的師父。外貌俊美、性格剛毅正直，在原著中為了守護正義而犧牲。

Baek Ri-ui-gang.description: The protagonist's father and a prestigious martial artist of the Baekli family. He is a righteous man and a teacher to the novel's original hero.

Ya-ul.description: A major antagonist and the leader of the Cheonsal-dan. He is the mastermind who kills Baek Ri-yeon in the original timeline.

Mourners.description: Unnamed individuals at Baek Ri-ui-gang's funeral who gossip maliciously about Baek Ri-yeon's reputation.
